roleset.name: Adaptable, changeable according to circumstances

example.name: BOLT corpus example
example.text: Budget can be flexible but ideally less than L 100 .

example.name: All args
example.text: I can be flexible with my schedule.

example.name: All args, "about" realization
example.text: They are flexible about days or evenings and will make time for everyone who qualifies.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. This roleset could be thought of as an abstract, metaphorical version of "bending" flex/flexible roleset, but it takes the additional "circumstances" argument that warrants a new roleset.

roleset.name: capable of being bent
roleset.note: Roleset corresponds to verb flex-v.02: bend an object. Framed by Claire. ADJ: The adj "flexible" seems to be compatible only with arg1.
